tags: Acting   Ancient China   Androgynous Characters   Apocalypse   Artificial Intelligence   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Confinement   Cross-dressing   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Dragons   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Immortals   Incest   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Master-Disciple Relationship   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Omegaverse   Possessive Characters   Royalty   R*pe   Shota   Showbiz   Stockholm Syndrome   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Twisted Personality   World Hopping   Yandere   Younger Love Interests   Zombies
author: Jiang Yang Sword   江洋大刀
description:
In the galactic era, humans have lost their emotions. These emotions have become a trading object, a complete box of emotions is a rare and priceless treasure at auction.

  One day, Jiang Fu, who made a living by defrauding human emotions and auctioning them, was captured by interstellar scientists and was forced to dive into the spiritual world of the most perfect artificial human in the interstellar to carry out the secret of 'making humans derive their emotions through catalysis' experiment.

Jiang Fu, who was unable to escape, agreed on the surface, but he wanted to do something bad, intending to completely destroy the cold artificial man.>
